abstract: Citigroup reorganized senior management at its private bank yesterday, replacing the chief executive, Damian M. Kozlowski, with two executives.
snippet: Citigroup reorganized senior management at its private bank yesterday, replacing the chief executive, Damian M. Kozlowski, with two executives.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup reorganized senior management at its private bank yesterday, replacing the chief executive, Damian M. Kozlowski, with two executives.

headline.main: Citigroup Shake-Up Puts Private Bank Under 2 Executives
headline.print_headline: Citigroup Shake-Up Puts Private Bank Under 2 Executives
